repos_data.description: RWKV is an RNN with transformer-level LLM performance. It can be directly trained like a GPT (parallelizable). So it's combining the best of RNN and transformer - great performance, fast inference, saves VRAM, fast training, "infinite" ctx_len, and free sentence embedding.
Code for loralib, an implementation of "LoRA: Low-Rank Adaptation of Large Language Models"
An implementation of model parallel GPT-2 and GPT-3-style models using the mesh-tensorflow library.
Simple Text-Generator with OpenAI gpt-2 Pytorch Implementation
